arts.ttl: Tyrese Campbell gives United victory over Wednesday in tight Sheffield derby
arts.sum: Tyrese Campbell’s second-half strike proved to be the difference in a gruelling Steel City derby to move Sheffield United into second in the Championship courtesy of victory over their arch-rivals Sheffield Wednesday. Derbies between Sheffield’s two biggest sides have been few and far between in recent seasons, with this only the fifth competitive fixture since 2012 and the first in more than 2,000 days. The last three had all finished 0-0 and throughout a fairly timid opening half here at Bramall Lane, it looked as though this could be the fourth in succession. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Tyrese Campbell strikes as Sheffield United take Steel City derby win
arts.sum: The Blades moved level on points with Championship leaders Sunderland.
